Eula.caption: Dance of the Shimmering Wave
Eula.name: Eula
Eula.description: The Spindrift Knight, a scion of old aristocracy, and the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company. The reason for which a descendant of the ancient nobles might join the Knights remains a great mystery in Mondstadt to this very day.

Aristocratic_Introspection.name: Aristocratic Introspection
Aristocratic_Introspection.effect: When Eula crafts Character Talent Materials, she has a 10% to receive double the product.

Roiling_Rime.name: Roiling Rime
Roiling_Rime.effect: If 2 stacks of Grimheart are consumed upon unleashing the Holding Mode of Icetide Vortex, a Lightfall Sword Remnant will be created that will explode immediately, dealing 50% of the basic Physical DMG dealt by a Lightfall Sword created by Glacial Illumination.

Wellspring_of_War-Lust.name: Wellspring of War-Lust
Wellspring_of_War-Lust.effect: When Eula's Normal Attacks score CRIT Hits, Icetide Vortex's CD will be decreased by 0.3s. This effect can occur once every 0.1s.

Favonius_Bladework_Edel.name: Favonius Bladework - Edel
Favonius_Bladework_Edel.effect:
Normal Attack: Performs up to five consecutive strikes.
Charged Attack: Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.
Plunging Attack: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

Icetide_Vortex.name: Icetide Vortex
Icetide_Vortex.effect:
Eula slashes swiftly, dealing Cryo DMG.
Press: Slashes swiftly, dealing Cryo DMG. When it hits an opponent, Eula gains a stack of Grimheart that stacks up to two times. These stats can only be gained once every 0.3s.
Grimheart: Increases Eula's resistance to interruption and DEF.
Hold: Consumes all stacks of Grimheart and lashes forward, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.
If Grimheart stacks are consumed, surrounding opponents will have their Physical RES and Cryo RES decreased.
Each stack of Grimheart consumed will be converted into an Icewhirl Brand that deals Cryo DMG to nearby opponents.

Glacial_Illumination.name: Glacial Illumination
Glacial_Illumination.effect:
Brandishes her greatsword, dealing Cryo DMG to nearby opponents and creating a Lightfall Sword that follows her around for a duration of up to 7s.
While present, the Lightfall Sword increases Eula's resistance to interruption. When Eula's own Normal Attack, Elemental Skill, and Elemental Burst deal DMG to opponents, they will charge the Lightfall Sword, which can gain an energy stack once every 0.1s.
Once its duration ends, the Lightfall Sword will descend and explode violently, dealing Physical DMG to nearby opponents.
This DMG scales on the number of energy stacks the Lightfall Sword has accumulated. If Eula leaves the field, the Lightfall Sword will immediately explode.

1.name: Tidal Illusion
1.effect:
Every time Icetide Vortex's Grimheart stacks are consumed, Eula's Physical DMG is increased by 30% for 6s.
Each stack consumed will increase the duration of this effect by 6s up to a maximum of 18s.

2.name: Lady of Seafoam
2.effect: Decreases the CD of Icetide Vortex's Holding Mode, rendering it identical to Press CD.

3.name: Ascendant Praise
3.effect:
Increases the Level of Glacial Illumination by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Divine Suppression
4.effect: Lightfall Swords deal 25% increased DMG against opponents with less than 50% HP.

5.name: Crimson Lotus Bloom
5.effect:
Increases the Level of Icetide Vortex by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Rite of Resurrection
6.effect: Lightfall Swords created by Glacial Illumination start with 5 stacks of energy. Normal Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts have a 50% chance to grant the Lightfall Sword an additional stack of energy.

Eula.introduction:
A rebellious descendant of the old aristocracy who is always out on the battlefield.
As one born into the old aristocracy, carrying the bloodline of sinners, Eula has needed a unique approach to the world to navigate the towering walls of prejudice peacefully. Of course, this did not prevent her from severing ties with her clan. As the outstanding Spindrift Knight, she hunts down Mondstadt's enemies in the wild to exact her unique "vengeance."

Kamisato_Ayaka.name: Kamisato Ayaka
Kamisato_Ayaka.description: The princess of the renowned House Kamisato of Inazuma. She's the embodiment of nobility and elegance.

Daily_Cooking.name: Daily Cooking
Daily_Cooking.effect: Kamisato Ayaka gains 1 additional Proficiency when she cooks a steamed Dish perfectly.

Kanten_Senmyou_Norito.name: Kanten Senmyou Norito
Kanten_Senmyou_Norito.effect: Normal Attack hits on enemies affected by Cryo have a 6%/18% chance respectively of shortening the CD of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 0.5s.

Amatsumi_Kunitsumi_Ihahigoto.name: Amatsumi Kunitsumi Ihahigoto
Amatsumi_Kunitsumi_Ihahigoto.effect:
While in Kamisato Art: Senho form, Kamisato Ayaka marks nearby opponents below 30% HP.
Leaving Senho form near marked opponents and immediately hitting them with a Normal Attack deals Cryo DMG equal to 300% of ATK.
This attack counts as a Charged Attack.

Kamisato_Art_Senho.name: Kamisato Art: Senho
Kamisato_Art_Senho.effect:
Ayaka consumes Stamina to hide within a swift flow of sleet that moves as she moves.
In Senho form, she moves at high speed on water.
When she reappears, the following effects are produced:
• Inflicts Cold on nearby opponents.
• Cold congeals along Ayaka's blade, converting her Attack DMG into Cryo DMG for a brief period.

Kamisato_Art_Naname.name: Kamisato Art - Naname
Kamisato_Art_Naname.effect:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a continuous stream of sword ki.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

Kamisato_Art_Hyouka.name: Kamisato Art: Hyouka
Kamisato_Art_Hyouka.effect: Ayaka emits ice around herself and shortly afterward launches nearby opponents, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

Kamisato_Art_Soumetsu.name: Kamisato Art: Soumetsu
Kamisato_Art_Soumetsu.effect:
Ayaka gathers frost with her fan and sword, creating bladestorms that continuously advance forward.
Bladestorm
• Deals Cryo DMG over time to all enemies in its path.
• After the damage over time has ended, the created bladestorm will burst, dealing Cryo DMG to all enemies in a bigger radius.

1.name: Sousai Sumizome Sakura
1.effect: Increases the DMG of Kamisato Art: Hyouka against enemies affected by Cryo by 20%.

2.name: Ai Suigetsu
2.effect:
Decreases the CD of Kamisato Art: Soumetsu by 2s.
Increases Energy Recharge by 15%.

3.name: Hanano Nishikie Kamifubuki
3.effect: Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Soumetsu by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Eikyo Ryuuhan
4.effect:
When Kamisato Ayaka's Energy is above 50%, her Normal Attack DMG is increased by 20%.
When Energy is below 50%, her Normal Attack CRIT Rate is increased by 10%.

5.name: Hanani Kumo Kaneni Irutsuki
5.effect: Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Hyoukaby 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Mie Yuki no Seki no To
6.effect: When casting Kamisato Art: Soumetsu, unleashes 2 smaller additional bladestorms, each dealing 20% of the original storm's DMG.

Kamisato_Ayaka.introduction: The princess of the Kamisato House. She occasionally practices swordsmanship so that she can pass time by slicing every falling snowflake floating around her on a snowy day.

Matsukaze_Karyuu.name: Matsukaze Karyuu
Matsukaze_Karyuu.effect:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

Ascend_1.name: Ascend 1
Ascend_1.effect:
If Chihayafuru comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro while being used, Elemental Absorption will occur during this Chihayafuru and it will deal additional 200% additional DMG of that elemental type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use of Chihayafuru.

Ascend_2.name: Ascend 2
Ascend_2.effect: Upon triggering a Swirl reaction, Kaedehara Kazuha will grant teammates a 0.03% Elemental DMG Bonus to their corresponding Element for every point of Elemental Mastery he has for 8s. Bonuses for different elements obtained through this method can co-exist.

Garyu_Bladework.name: Garyu Bladework
Garyu_Bladework.effect:
Normal Attack:
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.
Charged Attack:
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
Plunging Attack:
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
Plunging Attack: Ranran Haishi:
When in mid-air due to the effects of Chihayafuru, Plunging Attack DMG is converted to Anemo DMG and will create a miniature wind tunnel via a secret technique that pulls nearby objects and opponents in.

Chihayafuru.name: Chihayafuru
Chihayafuru.effect:
#Unleashes a secret technique as fierce as the rushing wind that pulls objects and opponents towards Kazuha's current position before launching the opponents within the AoE, dealing Anemo DMG and lifting Kazuha into the air on a rushing wind current.
When in mid-air due to the effects of Chihayafuru, a particularly powerful Plunging Attack, Ranran Haishi, will be unleashed.Press
Can be used in mid-air.
Hold: 
Charges up before unleashing greater Anemo DMG over a larger AoE than Press Mode.
Plunging Attack: Ranran Haishin: 
When in mid-air due to the effects of Chihayafuru, Plunging Attack DMG is converted to Anemo DMG and will create a miniature wind tunnel via a secret technique that pulls nearby objects and opponents in.
Ranran Haishin's DMG is considered Plunging Attack DMG.
"Winds in maples weep
for gods and men long-passed like
red autumn mountains"

Manyou_no_Ittou.name: Manyou no Ittou
Manyou_no_Ittou.effect:
The ultimate Garyu technique — a single slash akin to a coming storm that deals AoE Anemo DMG.
The blade's passage will leave behind a field named "Ruka Akino" that deals AoE Anemo DMG at set intervals to opponents within it.
Elemental Absorption: 
If Ruka Akino comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
"I see eternity go by in an instant, the autumns of many years from a single leaf. Thus I shall slice this maple in a flash, and ask a question of the ages—"

1.name: Senzan Kouhen
1.effect:
Decreases Chihayafuru's CD by 10%.
Using Manyou no Ittou resets the CD of Chihayafuru.

2.name: Yamaarashi Zanshin
2.effect: Increases the current active character's Elemental Mastery by 200 if they are within the AoE of the Ruka Akino field created by Manyou no Ittou

3.name: Fuushuu Kitan
3.effect:
Increases the Level of Chihayafuru by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Oozora Genpou
4.effect:
#When Kaedehara Kazuha's Energy is lower than 45, he obtains the following effects:
• Press or Hold Chihayafuru to regenerate 3 or 4 Energy for Kaedehara Kazuha respectively.
• Regenerate 2 Energy per second for Kaedehara Kazuha while gliding.

5.name: Bansei no Shuu
5.effect:
Increases the Level of Manyou no Ittou by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Ketsuseki Haku
6.effect: Kaedehara Kazuha gains a Anemo Infusion for 5s after using Chihayafuru or Manyou no Ittou. Additionally, each point of Elemental Mastery will increase the DMG dealt by Kaedehara Kazuha's Normal, Charged, Plunging, and Plunging Attack: Ranran Haishin by 0.2% while the aforementioned infusion is active.
